name: Perseid and You...
description:
"Perseid and You..." is a short and cozy game about a couple going on a date in the desert at night, to watch the Perseid Meteor Shower.

Featured Song: 

"With You/For You" by Prateek Kuhad

This Game was made as a final project for my class- Code Lab 1 at NYU Game Center (Spring '20).

Special Thanks to Matt Parker and rest of my classmates!

Peripherals required: Keyboard and Mouse. (Headphones recommended!)
